name: Po' Shines Cafe De La Soul
description: A Black-owned contemporary soul food restaurant with Cajun, Creole, and low-country flair. They also offer catering and workforce development through their non-profit program

name: Everybody Eats PDX
address: (Previously located at Oriental Value Food Market on SE Powell and 172nd, now moved across the river - specific new address not readily available in search results)
description: A Black-owned restaurant in downtown Portland offering a blend of Southern and Pacific Northwest cooking, with classic seafood and soul food

name: Kee's Loaded Kitchen
address: 3625 NE Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Portland, OR 97212
description: Known for hearty soul food dishes like smoked brisket, fried catfish, and loaded baked potatoes

name: Akadi
address: 1001 SE Division St Unit 2, Portland, OR 97202
description: Specializes in West African cuisine from Burkina Faso and the Ivory Coast, with a menu rich in seafood and vegetarian options

name: Dirty Lettuce
address: Shady Pines Vegan Food Court, 5240 NE 42nd Ave., Portland, OR 97218
description: An all-vegan food cart featuring Cajun, Creole, and Southern specialties
